CDs with Accessories
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): CD/DVD List: CDs with Accessories
Welcome, Ranchers. This is a new area for Cds and DVDs that contain monsters wearing accessories. Here, all we ask for is the CD or DVD name and the accessory. You can still post your CD or DVD in the CD List. Oh, and the monster that can wear it. This is just to make it easier to find these special discs.
